Class DB_ClientInfo

java.lang.Object
DB_ClientInfo
public class DB_ClientInfo
extends java.lang.Object
Class that carries the client information for the database to access and store

  • Constructor Details

    • DB_ClientInfo

      public DB_ClientInfo​(int uniqueID, java.lang.String playerName, java.net.InetAddress IPAddress, int PortNumber)
      Constructor that creates a fresh client info if it is a new user
      Parameters:
      uniqueID - fresh id for new user
      playerName - name for a new user
      IPAddress - IP address for a new user
      PortNumber - Port Number for a new user

    • DB_ClientInfo

      public DB_ClientInfo​(int uniqueID, java.lang.String playerName, java.net.InetAddress IPAddress, int PortNumber, int totalScore, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> previousAnswers, boolean ready)
      Constructor that holds client info for a user that is stored in the database
      Parameters:
      uniqueID - ID for a user in the DB
      playerName - Name for a user in the DB
      IPAddress - IP Address for a user in the DB
      PortNumber - Port Number for a user in the DB
      totalScore - total score for a user that is in the DB
      previousAnswers - arraylist of answers for a user stored in the DB
      ready - ready state for a user who is stored in the DB
